name: Brushfire North
tag_list: computers, programming, software, strategy, support, websites, website-development, mobile-apps, mobile-web
overview:
Brushfire North is a digital services agency located in Liberty Village, Toronto.

Acting as planners, builders, collaborators, and problem solvers, we provide unique interactive experiences and end-to-end technical solutions comprised of beautiful and functional pieces of software, each as varied and distinctive as our clients.

Our leadership in software development is derived through honest and informed consultation, and the utilization of new and emerging technologies. Our mission is to convey this vision to each client in order that informed decisions are made right from the planning phase of a project, and to deliver a high-end product that fits their specific business requirement.

Our interactive experiences can be delivered over the Internet or through internal networks to end users, with focus on four main areas of service:

Strategy: We offer strategic services, including application architecture and project management, providing decision makers practical, expert advice to facilitate the decision-making process.

Design: Whether building on a client’s existing tools or creating something wholly new, we construct captivating designs that are user focused, created with an intimate knowledge of how a user interacts with various browsers and mobile devices. Form meets function in our deeply considered interfaces and designs that evoke emotion and are targeted for the project audience.

Development: We offer the highest-quality software development services for all our clients; from distributed inventory-control systems to research-based websites, we execute your project’s plan whether it was created by us or another vendor.

Support: We offer ongoing support services ranging from hosting, to application monitoring and maintenance, to training services.

Additionally, we produce content-managed and marketing-related websites, micro-sites, games, software, and custom-built LOB applications.

For agencies and media companies in need of a trusted production team, we offer high-quality development services and have staff available to support a project manager and turnaround any project on time and on budget and hassle free
